actions.recommendation: Please report on any new changes in your health in the coming months.

Focus on decreasing your waist circumference as it is more than 90 cm which is associated with a higher risk of heart disease and diabetes. To decrease your risk of a cardiovascular events aim for a BMI of <25 and a waist-to-height ratio of <50%.
An abdominal ultrasound is especially recommended - you are welcome to follow up with HwH or your regular GP.
